ygData.subject: RE: Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet Available
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Use pixie strike.  Not as much of a taunt as the warriors get, but it takes the mob out of the fight, so you don t have to worry about taking damage
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 30 Dec 1999, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:

> Actually I sometimes I wish I did have a taunting tune, esp when the cleric
> or enchanter in the group is getting pounded and the mobis too high to charm

Use pixie strike. Not as much of a taunt as the warriors get, but it
takes the mob out of the fight, so you don't have to worry about taking
damage yourself (until that frickin painbringer procs; every time I hear
someone shout Free Painbringer, I ask'em to destroy it).

Athren
